display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (Supine): (Apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used+ hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and no oxygen desaturation threshold used) / hours of sleep in supine position from type IV home sleep apnea test
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events. The curent AASM guidelines refer to this as the Respiratory Event Index (REI) since sleep is not directly recorded.
